# This is how you make a graph

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

xs = np.linspace(0,1000)

plt.title("y = 24x")
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("y")
plt.plot(xs,24 * xs)
```

# This is how to create a table

```{python}
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame(np.array([xs, 24*xs]).transpose()) 
df.columns = ['x','y']
df
```
